name: Sacred Fishtank
description: A circular room filled with warm, bioluminescent light.
In the centre, a levitating fishtank gurgles quietly — like it’s waiting.
The air smells faintly of brine and judgement.

interactions.text: You lower Dominic’s bowl into the sacred tank. There is a shimmer, a spark, and a flash of bubbles...
effects: addInventoryItem({ id: 'dominic', name: 'Dominic the Fish (Alive)', description: 'Somehow, he’s back. And more sarcastic than ever.' })

interactions.text: Dominic swims in serene circles. Occasionally, he mutters something about multiverse ethics.
